name: consulta_empresa
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Fetches company information based on the given CNPJ ID using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The first 8 digits of the CNPJ used to identify the company.
